titles.title: As the bridegroom to His chosen

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}As the bridegroom to His chosen, As the king unto the realm, As the keep unto the castle, As the pilot to the helm, So, Lord, art Thou to me.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}As the fountain in the garden, As the candle in the dark, As the treasure in the coffer, As the manna in the ark. So, Lord, art Thou to me.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}As the music at the banquet As the stamp unto the seal, As the medâ€™cine to the fainting, As the wine-cup at the meal, So, Lord, art Thou to me.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}As the ruby in the setting, As the honey in the comb, As the light within the lantern, As the father in the home, So, Lord, art Thou to me.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}As the sunshine in the heavens, As the image in the glass, As the fruit unto the fig tree, As the dew unto the grass, So, Lord, art Thou to me.{/lang-eng}
